net.fathomsoft.nova.tree

Class Scope

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.fathomsoft.nova.tree.Node
      • net.fathomsoft.nova.tree.Scope

  • public class Scope
extends Node
    Node extension that represents a scope of code. In essence, a collection of statements within a pair of curly braces.

    For example: 
     {
        ...
 
        // Statements within here...
 
        ...
 }
    Since:
    v0.1 Apr 5, 2014 at 10:54:20 PM
    Version:
    v0.2.21 Jul 30, 2014 at 1:45:00 PM
    Author:
    Braden Steffaniak

                                                 boolean outputChildren)
        Description copied from class: Node
        Generate the Nova syntax String that represents the Node. Essentially, this is the String that is decoded into the node. It is the input value from the .nova source file.
        Overrides:

        Parameters:
        builder - The StringBuilder to append the data to.
        outputChildren - Whether or not to output the children of the children of the Node as well.
        Returns:
